text: īmāṉ koṇṭavarkaḷē! Muḥmiṉāṉa peṇkaḷai nīṅkaḷ maṇantu, piṟaku nīṅkaḷ avarkaḷai toṭuvataṟku muṉṉamēyē'talāk' ceytu viṭṭīrkaḷāṉāl, avarkaḷ viṣayattil nīṅkaḷ kaṇakkiṭak kūṭiya (ittat)tavaṇai oṉṟum uṅkaḷukku illai - ākavē avarkaḷukkut (takkatāka) ētēṉum koṭuttu aḻakāṉa muṟaiyil avarkaḷai viṭuvittu viṭuṅkaḷ
